headline: onsemi and Innoscience Announce Plans to Collaborate to Speed Global Rollout of GaN Power Portfolio
summary: Collaboration would add high-volume, cost-optimized, worldwide GaN manufacturing for faster market deployment of energy-efficient power devicesSummary:onsemi announced it has signed a memorandum of understanding with Innoscience to explore expanding production of gallium nitride (GaN) power devices using Innoscience’s proven 200mm GaN-on-silicon process. The collaboration would combine onsemi’s system integration, drivers, and packaging expertise with Innoscience’s GaN wafers and high-volume man

headline: ON Semiconductor Shares Steady Amid Analyst Upgrades and Year-to-Date Drop of 18%
summary: Wondering if ON Semiconductor stock is a bargain or an opportunity hiding in plain sight? You are not alone, as many investors are questioning its current value. The stock has seen some volatility lately, rising 4.4% over the past week and inching up just 0.7% for the month. However, it is still down 18.3% year-to-date and 27.8% over the past year. Recent news around sector demand and supply chain adjustments, as well as analyst upgrades and shifting market sentiment on chipmakers, have all...
